entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning late in the evening then changing to snow after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 27 March 2023
